SEARCH:
Package datastorage

Klasse TreatmentDAO

java.lang.Object
datastorage.DAOimp<Treatment>
datastorage.TreatmentDAO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
DAO<Treatment>
public class TreatmentDAO extends DAOimp<Treatment>
Implements the Interface DAOImp. Overrides methods to generate specific treatment-SQL-queries.
